publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5488 Michael Matheson: Congratulations to Nethermains Primary Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Nethermains Primary School in Denny on producing a CD; notes that the pupils have written a song about healthy living; recognises that the healthy living message will spread even wider through such initiatives, and considers that the CD is a valuable contribution to making 2010 a more healthy and active year.
S3M-5488 Congratulations to Nethermains Primary School (lodged on 11 January 2010) Alasdair Allan*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-5488 Congratulations to Nethermains Primary School (lodged on 11 January 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Pauline McNeill*, Hugh Henry*
